p.k: Former rivals and NBA Legends Magic Johnson and Isiah Thomas sit down for a wide-ranging and emotional conversation. During the episode, Johnson and Thomas reconnect and look back on four decades of memories and experiences, including the 30th anniversary of the 1988 NBA Finals, the pair's off-season travels and bonding, how the two balanced their friendship and competitiveness and the ups and downs of their relationship leading up to their recent reunion.
